version_description:
Version 2.1
An even more creative, artistic and intelligent Smart Swarmandal.
A frequency display to help with faster fine tuning.

New Taal - Bhajani
New Instrument - Manjira
AI, Sound, UI and performance improvements, bug fixes.

New Taal (Bhajani), New Instrument (Manjira)
Take a screenshot to get help or send feedback.
UI, AI, sound and performance improvements.

* New Talented Taal (Roopak)
* New detailed note accuracy reports on the score page.
* New setting to hide matra (beat) number.

- New Taal - Addha teentaal
- Greatly improved AI for noisy environments (stage, car, etc) on iOS 13.
- Smarter Swarmandal now accompanies in many new modes.
- Tabla has become raga aware - bols like tu and rishabh-dhin will now play kre / kre 2 / sre 1 / sre based on raga and tuning.
- Improved adaptive volume on all instruments
- Support for iOS 13.

- New Intelligent Taal - Jhaptaal (previously added : Roopak, Addha-Teentaal, Bhajani, Teentaal & Ektaal). More taals will be added regularly.
- Smarter tuner display that reduces distractions, provides better biofeedback.
- Swarmandal smart start with Tanpura.
- Stability and performance fixes.

New in version 3.7
- An even more realistic Smart Swarmandal with new playing modes, improved AI and tone.
- UI design has been upgraded to support rotation, and split-view and multi tasking on iPad.
- Pitch, Fine and Tuning settings have moved to perform tab and now also include the tuner level. Indian style pitch shown with frequency.
- 3 New pitches for instruments - A2, A#2, B2
- Redesigned 3 octave keyboard
- Stability and Performance improvements

New in version 3.7.1
- An even more realistic Smart Swarmandal with new playing modes, improved AI and tone.
- UI design has been upgraded to support rotation, and split-view and multi tasking on iPad.
- Pitch, Fine and Tuning settings have moved to perform tab and now also include the tuner level. Indian style pitch shown with frequency.
- 3 New pitches for instruments - A2, A#2, B2
- Redesigned 3 octave keyboard
- Stability and Performance improvements.
- Fix for a rare crash when updating from a very old version.

New intelligent Taal - Dadra, and improved Tabla AI with more finesse, bravado and artistry.
Also,
- Improved performance (~20% cpu reduction)
- New interactive onboarding (find it in the help)
- Improvements in UI, under the covers.

* v4.0 - INTRODUCING SMART HARMONY for all genres*
Pop to Jazz, Bollywood to Indian Classical, and everything in between!
Automatic, creative, and mood-aware harmony played on Strings and Piano as you perform.

* STRINGS - Add soulful color with rich, soft Strings that swell up and fade gracefully.
* PIANO - Add flavor and flair with arpeggios and chords.
* AUTOMATIC HARMONIZER - A new mode in the Raga/Scales menu for playing harmony intelligently based for any song in any genre.
* NEW WESTERN MODES / SCALES - Ionian, Aeolian, Dorian, Phrygian, Lydian, Mixolydian, Locrian and Blues

Other changes:
- Tap beat gauge to toggle between a large beat gauge and a mini beat gauge (and a mini tuner gauge and large tuner gauge).
- Mixer panel has a master volume and settings control which has a new setting for adaptive volume for all instruments.
- New Raga and Taal menus, search by notes in the Raga / Scale
- Improved Swarmandal Tone, lowered cpu usage
- Faster app launch
- 25+% reduction in CPU usage when app is running in perform tab and screen is on.
- Fix a rare crash in the subscriptions page.
- Fix crash when app launches when a call is in progress
- Many other improvements under the covers

The highly requested feature - Recording, is now here!
In fact, NaadSadhana is now also a Full Multitrack Recording and Mixing Studio!
We've also gone ahead and added In-Ear Monitoring (with 3D instrument placement, EQ and reverb) to give you a full stage/studio experience.
After recording, you can change track volumes levels and effects and bounce and share a file. Power users can export the entire session and all tracks for advanced editing in your favorite DAW.
Other notable features include full accessibility and VoiceOver support, a new tuning (12 Tone Equal Temperament), New Note naming styles (Hindi, Carnatic, English and Latin), improvements to the interface to make it fast, clean and buttery smooth, a new Raga (Latangi) and many more improvements across the board!

NaadSadhana is now better than ever, with new Taals, Ragas/Scales, features and more:
1. Hands Free controls for Rhythm & Percussion - control rhythm instruments with subtle facial gestures.
2. Perform tab has been redesigned to make your performance more streamlined than ever.
3. New Taal - Keherwa
4. New Ragas / Scales - Gaud Sarang, Kaamod, Manjh Khamaj, Shuddha Bilawal, Shuddha Scale.
5. Share long recordings with ease, with mixed down tracks being 20X smaller, with no difference in audio quality.
6. Several fixes and speedups, stability improvements.
